title: Toritorinoki - maybe closed
description: APR 2014 note: its vegan cafe location in front of Omokagebashi station at 3-17-23, F1 Nishiwaseda, Shinjuku City, 169-0051, Waseda, reported shut down. Now only does catering and events. NOTE: maybe closed/shut down, please verify and let HappyCow know.
